ygData.subject: Re: It's Showtime
ygData.msgSnippet: Prebon smiles a dark, ominous grin, I apreciate the opportunity for advancement. he replied knowing full well how big an opportunity had just presented

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Prebon smiles a dark, ominous grin, "I apreciate the opportunity for
advancement." he replied knowing full well how big an opportunity had just
presented itself. "Yes, never against the master, I have no malice toward
your master."
----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2001 8:46 PM
Subject: Re: It's Showtime


> Shivah:
>
> "Agree, but if your commands are agaisnt the master of BlackFortres I
> won't follow them"answered Shivah "I see that you have a big chance
> to get here a high rank after Darkfate, due your skills"
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Prebon smirked, it was unusual for the leaders to want to be
> retrained, but not entirely unheard of. "If you can follow my orders
> without question or attempting to throw your rank around you are
> welcome to join in. BUT I insist on having complete control of the
> group." Trainer units had control of thier regiment during all
> training procedures, if a higher rank attempted to take over he had
> the right to disregard the order and have the bot removed from the
> training area. This prevented any bots who weren't ready for field
> work from being removed to soon.
> >
> >
> >   ----- Original Message -----
> >   From: Airshadow Nightlight
> >   To: nbwrpg@y...
> >   Sent: Saturday, June 02, 2001 1:39 PM
> >   Subject: Re: It's Showtime
> >
> >
> >   Shivah:
> >
> >   Shivah walked towards quarter's section and suddenly he said "I
> was thinking about you told me about who make the history... I'm
> interested to train with you... "
> >
> >
> >
> >     CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> >
> >     "That will be fine" replied Prebon, he was anxious to get his
> informationand get the training sesions started. "You may send me the
> information in my quarters and I'll prepare for the trainees." He
> wasn't one to slack, he believed in leading by example, then the
> recruits have no excuses for being lazy. He'd leave those
> expectations for the bookworm functioned bots.
> >       ----- Original Message -----
> >       From: airly2000@y...
> >       To: nbwrpg@y...
> >       Sent: Friday, June 01, 2001 11:44 AM
> >       Subject: RE: It's Showtime
> >
> >
> >       Shivah::
> >
> >       Shivah didn't say anything, he never told what he was
> thinking.
> >
> >        "Come"said the young-bot "You would like see around and I
> guess that you meet your quarters"
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >       From: CYBERWOLF4
> >         To: nbwrpg@y...
> >         Sent: Friday, June 01, 2001 7:22 AM
> >         Subject: Re: It's Showtime
> >
> >
> >         Prebon smiled, "Trust me" would be the first thing a spider
> would say to a fly before inviting it in. Something told him that the
> Predacons at this base looked at him as the fly.
> >           ----- Original Message -----
> >           From: airly2000@y...
> >           To: nbwrpg@y...
> >           Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2001 10:01 PM
> >           Subject: RE: It's Showtime
> >
> >
> >           Shivah::
> >
> >           "YOu shouldn't be worried about me...Just two bots here
> are problematic: my Sister Alecto and my bro. Luzbel" said Shivah
> >             ----- Original Message -----
> >             From: CYBERWOLF4
> >             To: nbwrpg@y...
> >             Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2001 5:06 PM
> >             Subject: Re: It's Showtime
> >
> >
> >             Prebon smiles, it was a good trait that Shivah was
> observing him as much as
> >             he was watching the Drackotrons leader. "Yes I am, it
> allows me to live for
> >             the next day." He wasn't paranoid, just cautious,
> physically he knew that
> >             he'd be a chewtoy for the other bot, mentally he hadn't
> figured out yet, but
> >             strategically he had already made a mental note of a
> few advantages that he
> >             had.
> >
> >
> >             ----- Original Message -----
> >             From: <airly2000@y...>
> >             To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> >             Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2001 7:58 AM
> >             Subject: Re: It's Showtime
> >

> >             > Shivah:

> >             > "Are you always so cautious?" asked Shivah whe he saw
> Preborn's
> >             > behaivor.
> >             >

> wrote:
> >             > > Prebon turned and followed Shivah still keeping a
> safe distance and
> >             > > observing the way the bot moved.
> >             > > ----- Original Message -----
> >             > > Fr! om: <airly2000@y...>
> >             > > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> >             > > Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 4:04 PM
> >             > > Subject: Re: It's Showtime

> me, I'll show
> >             > you
> >             > > > all things that you need to know"
> >             > > >
> >             > > > Shivah walked slowly towads the exit

> <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:

> before he could be
> >             > > > effective as a training bot. "I'd like to see
> some maps, logs, and
> >             > > > weather patterns before I begin." He stated
> calmly looking around
> >             > the
> >             > > > room. He started to pace across the room with his
> hands clenched
> >             > > > behind his back, "And of course I'll need the
> service records of
> >             > the> > > bots wyo will be placed in my custody." He
> turned to face Shivah
> >             > once
> >             > > > more. 'By the way, Greatness comes from those who
> MAKE the history
> >             > > > not the ones who merely study it." Prebon himself
> had studied
> >             > history
> >             > > > and knew that the only way to avoid the same
> mistakes is to change
> >             > > > the history.

> >             > > > >   From: Airshadow Nightlight
> >             > > > >   To: nbwrpg@y...

> >             > > > >   Subject: Re: It's Showtime

> >             > > > >   Shivah::
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >   Shivah sighed again and said "First of all,
> I'm very sorry
> >             > about
> >             > > > Attilla's behavior, he's extremely rude...
> altoug! h Luzbel and
> >             > Alecto
> >             > > > are worst. Second I'm Shivah, commander of the
> subgroups of
> >             > Drakobots
> >             > > > and my boss is Darkfate, master of the
> BlackFortress where
> >             > you're...
> >             > > > Rule here is easy, don't try anything against The
> Top boss and all
> >             > > > will be ok... Do you like meet the base or do you
> rather that I
> >             > see
> >             > > > your leadership's skills first? "
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >     CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >     Prebon followed Ainto the room stepping
> aside to watch the
> >             > > > Drakon leave. I see you enjoy history almost as
> much as I do." he
> >             > > > claimed picking up the book and tossing it back
> to Shivah.  "I see
> >             > > > that you are Predacon but I am unaware of your
> rank or subgroup."
> >             > the
> >             > > > snide Trai! ners manners were upalling as he
> stared the other bot
> >             > eye
> >             > > > to eye. "Now tell me, why was I transferred here
> and where are the
> >             > > > recruits that need to be placed in line?" A
> trainer unit was only
> >             > > > used for recruitment programming, a sort of Boot
> camp for
> >             > > > Transformers. A dull unglorified life as it were,
> work with the
> >             > new
> >             > > > units and watch them soar through the ranks to
> end up bossing
> >             > around
> >             > > > thier former commanders. As a Trainer unit the
> only authority he
> >             > had
> >             > > > was on the training field, now that he was
> removed he'd be lucky
> >             > to
> >             > > > be looked at as a qualified unit commander.
> >             > > > >       ----- Original Message -----
> >             > > > >       From: airly2000@y...
> >             > > > >       To: nbwrpg@! y...
> >             > > > >       Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 11:32 PM
> >             > > > >       Subject: RE: It's Showtime
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >       Attilla/Shivah:
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >       Shivah was sat camly reading a cyberbook
> in one room when
> >             > > > Attilla arrived, the first-born of Drakonbots
> didn't noticed that
> >             > > > about (Attila's arriving ) until his young
> brother snatched the
> >             > cybe-
> >             > > > book and Attilla shouted while he wished annoy
> his old brother.
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >       "What are you reading Old-bro??? "THE
> PREDACON'S WARS... "
> >             > > > UGHHH!!! You should better do other things than
> read a bored
> >             > History
> >             > > > boo! k!!!.. "
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >       "Who doesn't know what were past's
> mistakes, he will make
> >             > > > them in the future... If we like beat our
> enemies, we must study
> >             > our
> >             > > > past... it's easy to understand" replyed Shivah
> aparently calmed.
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >       "I Insist that you should better do other
> things, bro"
> >             > said
> >             > > > Attilla "Well, my pal Preborn has some complaints
> and he likes
> >             > speak
> >             > > > with you... So I leave you alone"
> >             > > > >
> >             > > > >       And Attila left the place throwing the
> cyber-book toward a
> >             > > > table that was around, Shivah sighed and waited
> that Preborn
> >             > spoke.

> >             >! ; > > >         From: CYBERWOLF4

> >             > > > wouldn't get lost.

> to see Shivah, i
> >             > can

> to follow him

> shock. this bot seemed
> >             > > > like it was completely oblivious to the name
> Prebon. His very name
> >             > > > was spoken with honor for being the Trainer of
> some of the most
> >             > > > successfull units in the Predacon army. "My name
> is Prebon,
> >             > remember
> >             > > > it with respect and dignity." this bot obviously
> needed to be
> >             > taught
> >             > > > some order. P! rebon began to wonder if that is
> why he had been
> >             > > > selected to transfer to this out of the way rock
> in the universe.

> The former Trainer

> to be treated."

> >             > > > be so considerate as to introduce us I would be
> greatfull" He
> >             > > > continued in mock courtesy making a request sound
